The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Thursday

Cream Tomato Soup with Basil – vegan / paper bio container / 330 ml (tomato, basil, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chickpea Balls & Carrot Steam – vegan / gluten free/ paper bio container / 300 g (chickpea, parsley, corn, olive oil, himalayan salt, carrot, celery, potato, natural condiments)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Pear, Banana and Pineapple Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (coconut, cashew, pears, almonds, banana, pineapple, cocoa butter, vanilla, goji, lemon, unfiltered honey)
